<h2>Who are we?</h2>

[HostWithLinux](https://hostwithlinux.net) is a UK based web host, providing budget cPanel and VPS hosting since 2012. We offer support through ticket, live chat and email. Our latest offer is our USA based reseller hosting located in Los Angeles in the ColoCrossing datacenter on E3 / 32GB ram.

<h2>Plans</h2>

[**$6/Month USA cPanel Reseller Hosting - Click here to order**](https://billing.hostwithlinux.net/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=64)

* 150GB RAID10, SSD Cached Disk
* 50TB Bandwidth on a shared gigabit port
* Unlimited Accounts
* Unlimited Domains/databases/email accounts
* Overselling Allowed
* 5 free dedicated IP's with rDNS on request

<h2>What else do we offer?</h2>

* Premium Softaculous apps installer
* Whitelabel cPanel login URL
* cPanel Cloudflare plugin
* Low number of accounts per server
* Free account migration for under 50 accounts
* Apache 2.4 with PHP 5.4
* MySQL, MySQLi and PostgreSQL
* Ioncube/ZendGuard extensions
* PHP Caching with XCache
* Mod Security with domain control
* AWStats, Webalizer and Analog stats
* 100% uptime guarantee

A test looking glass for Los Angeles can be found at http://lg.la.colocrossing.com   

<h2>Support</h2>

Feel free to [PM me](http://lowendtalk.com/messages/add/linuxthefish), [create a support ticket](https://billing.hostwithlinux.net/index.php?fuse=support&controller=ticket&view=submitticket) or send an email to support(at)hostwithlinux.net if you have any questions, queries or worries.

Please make sure to read our [terms of service](https://hostwithlinux.net/tos.html) before you order, and extra dedicated IP's can be bought for $1 per month with justification. Thank you for your time, we hope you choose us for your reseller hosting needs!
